definitions.definition: The act of exporting ; the act of conveying or sending commodities abroad or to another country, in the course of commerce .
The act of carrying something away or out from a place.

Either the logical law ( ( P ∧ Q ) → R ) ⇒ ( P → ( Q → R ) ) {\displaystyle ((P\land Q)\to R)\Rightarrow (P\to (Q\to R))} , or the rule of replacement ( ( P ∧ Q ) → R ) ⇔ ( P → ( Q → R ) ) {\displaystyle ((P\land Q)\to R)\Leftrightarrow (P\to (Q\to R))} .

main_definition: ( business , economics ) The act of exporting ; the act of conveying or sending commodities abroad or to another country, in the course of commerce .
secondary_definitions: ( import / export ) The commodity exported; an export.
( obsolete ) The act of carrying something away or out from a place.

( logic ) Either the logical law ( ( P ∧ Q ) → R ) ⇒ ( P → ( Q → R ) ) {\displaystyle ((P\land Q)\to R)\Rightarrow (P\to (Q\to R))} , or the rule of replacement ( ( P ∧ Q ) → R ) ⇔ ( P → ( Q → R ) ) {\displaystyle ((P\land Q)\to R)\Leftrightarrow (P\to (Q\to R))} .
